entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:39 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C

Observed at: CFB Trenton 12:43 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 33 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
